name: Dragon Likes Fruit
description:
How to play / Controls:

  • [Enter] Skip Text
  • [A] & [D] Walk left and right
  • [Space] Jump (press twice for double-jump)
  • [W] Hold to charge and shoot a fireball (can damage enemies and lit torches)
  • [S] Bite (attack enemies and trigger switches)
  • [E] Open doors
  • [B] Reset Level
  • Note: You can destroy secret blocks by with [S] or [W]

DragonLikesFruit is small plattformer, where you collect fruit as a dragon. You can play one demo level, find secrets, solve puzzles and fight enemies. I created the game over the last months during my free time, so its more like a prototype. But I surely would like you to give it a go and play it, and if you like I would highly appreciate giving me some feedback!

Can you find the big apple and all fruit?

If you would like to use the sprites used in this game, you can check my assets out!
There free to use both in personal and commercial projects.
